tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LegalRequirements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  last_updated_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyChanges (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255),
  change_description TEXT,
  effective_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IndustryStandards (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_level VARCHAR(50),
  published_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TravelInsuranceCompanies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  headquarters_location VARCHAR(100),
  founding_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_description TEXT,
  record_date DATE,
  related_entity_id INT
)
